sense.gloss: last runner or swimmer in a relay team
link to previous post (e.g. in web forums)

sdata.j: ↑回答↑↓かいとう↓には|アンカー|を↑必↑↓かなら↓ずつけて↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。↑半角↑↓はんかく↓で ">>"＋↑数字↑↓すうじ↓（↑例↑↓れい↓: >>1）です。
sdata.e: Please ensure you always include a link-back in your replies. ">>" in plain ASCII + number (e.g. >>1).
